title: The Demon's Well
description: A night that lives in my mind. The blood and pain that stained my heart. What I would give to close my eyes and not see my life pass before my eyes. The trust I had now gone and has died.If you made it through that night as I you would understand why I speak the words I do.A old saying I live true to ( If you get close to an angel you will learn to fly. If you get close to a demon you will be stuck in its well when it runs dry! )Tell me who lives by your side.
author: Vincent   Edwards
